message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.AR, cs.SY, cs.CC 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper proposes a new algorithm for decoding polar codes, which is a topic of interest in information theory. 
2. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper discusses the memory requirements of the decoding algorithm and proposes a partitioning approach to reduce memory usage, which is related to data structures and algorithms. 
3. cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) - The paper discusses the hardware implementation of the decoding algorithm and proposes a method to reduce memory usage, which is related to hardware architecture. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a new algorithm for decoding polar codes, which is a topic of interest in control systems. 
5. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper discusses the memory requirements of the decoding algorithm and proposes a method to reduce memory usage, which is related to computational complexity.
